prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a segmented body and vibrant colors.
I want a unique Pokemon that can blend into urban environments effortlessly.
Generate a Pokemon that features sharp spikes and a rounded shell.
Make a creature that can thrive in both forest and mountain habitats.
Imagine a poison-type Pokemon with a sleek, shiny exterior and vibrant accents.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a small caterpillar into a formidable creature.
Show me a Pokemon with defensive capabilities and a unique camouflage technique.
